name: Voyage Pittoresque #8
describe: The ‘Mantra’ is a silkscreen print with diamond dust, created by Master Contemporary artist, Damien Hirst in 2011. This massive, stately, and shimmering print is the largest ever created by Hirst in his entire career to date.

name: Butterfly Heart
describe: December 1961—Madame Jean Serpieri sits in the ballroom of the Tour La Reine near Athens, wearing a gown which belonged to the wife of Otto, the first king of modern Greece.
